Message.Title: 787 update
Message.Msg: NYC787 blog has updated some info. It says one 787 for air India has had it's contractual delivery on Friday and lists it as delivered. The ceremony may happen on Monday. It also says more deliveries in August are expected (but not guaranteed). LAN 787 on 8-27 Qatar 787 on 8-30 ANA 787 on 8-30 JAL 787 on 8-30 Air India on 8-31 Seven more 787's are projected for delivery in September (second half of September for most of them)

Message.Title: Neil Armstrong dies . . .
Message.Msg: By Paul Duggan, Updated: Saturday, August 25, 1:00 PM Neil Armstrong, the astronaut who marked an epochal achievement in exploration with “one small step” from the Apollo 11 lunar module on July 20, 1969, becoming the first person to walk on the moon, died Aug. 25 at 82. His family announced the death in a statement but did not disclose where he died. They attributed it to “complications resulting from cardiovascular procedures.” +++ The end of an ERA

Message.Title: Ah, now I understand the neocons on this board!
Message.Msg: a plank from the 2012 platform of the Republican Party of Texas which reads as follows: "We oppose the teaching of Higher Order Thinking Skills (HOTS) (values clarification), critical thinking skills and similar programs that are simply a relabeling of Outcome-Based Education (OBE) (mastery learning) which focus on behavior modification and have the purpose of challenging the student's fixed beliefs and undermining parental authority."

Message.Title: Boeing update
Message.Msg: for the week BA is down as usual, opened Monday at 72 and change closed 71 and change for the Year Boeing has lost money it is still a 0.00% stock. While apple for the week is up nicely and for the month apple has gained almost 100 dollars compared to the all time historical high for Boeing of 92 on October2,2007.(historical requires you to look at the adjused price) So my portfolio like all apple investors is up another 61% year to date while the Boeing spammers are 0.00% for the year. BTW apple just won a billion dollar lawsuit against samsung, so ka ching for me going forward. Boeing pumps how is that plane order working for you now !

so in round numbers if all BA pump were to have had $100000, in apple prior to this month and you stopped all the airplane is good stuff on a small investment of the above you would be sitting on $18,000 gain for the month, so hows that Boeing stock price working for you now
